#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int a[26]={0},c[26]={0},cost=0;
        string b;
        cin>>b;
        for(i=0;b[i]!='\0';i++)
        {
           if(b[i]>='a'&&b[i]<='z')
           {
                a[(b[i]-'a')]++;
                cost+=a[(b[i]-'a')]%2;
           }
           if(b[i]>='A'&&b[i]<='Z')
           {
                c[(b[i]-'A')]++;
                cost+=c[(b[i]-'A')]%2;
           }
        }
        cout<<cost<<"\n";

    }


}
